nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 43, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. High near 49, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. East northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 9pm, then rain showers and a slight chance of sleet between 9pm and midnight, then sleet and freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and freezing rain. Cloudy. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and freezing rain before midnight, then sleet likely and freezing rain likely and a slight chance of snow showers between midnight and 3am, then snow showers likely and sleet likely. Cloudy, with a low around 14. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
